cab.content: V0(K A$JKIo^DOCUI^JJT lb THIJ M1M OJ HIb BHIMNIC I^JE,jTYTa QOVLfiHLibkT),B C E E T.iv a e Cabinet,PEACE TLELS.The following five naval points laid down as a basis for a consideration of peace with Germany are submitted to the War Cabinet by Admiral of the Fleet Lord Fisher of Kilverstone :-(1) The German High bea Fleet to be delivered up intact.(2) ditto - Etfeacy German Submarine,(3) ditto - Heligoland.(4) ditto - the two flanking islands of Syltand Sorkum,(5) l]o spot of German Jesuitry in the wide world to be permitted : - It would infallibly be a Submarine Base,(Signed). L.P.A.HAHKEY,Secretary.
